This company was founded in the year  trading on crytocurrency including btc mining. In 2019 a group of professional FOREX traders with the aim of accumulating assets of several large investors for the most efficient trading on the currency and stock markets decided to change this for a better goal. Since the founding of Fx-investmentminers, our principles have been absolute transparency, dedication to our clients, as well as a complete understanding of the features of our profile market and the expectations of different types of investors. View Certificate Team Approach All decisions are made collectively by our experienced investment team. Resources Fx-investmentminers has the ability to leverage numerous relationships within the private wealth management arena as well as work extensively with our clients’ other professional advisors to ensure continuity of their overall plan. Globally licensed & regulated Fx-investmentminers is a global leader in online financial trading and investing Philosophy Our success has come from an open and pragmatic approach to investment. We firmly believe that different styles of management, tools and research, work in different parts of the investment cycle. We therefore maintain a flexible investment process. Independence We are independent of outside influences, selecting funds from the whole of market, with no restrictions placed on us by third parties. What We Offer Forex is the world's most liquid and heavily traded market with over £5 trillion traded daily. Learn More A cryptocurrency is a digital or virtual currency that uses cryptography for security. A cryptocurrency is difficult to counterfeit because of this security feature. Crude oil is one of the most actively traded commodities in the world, and its price affects the price of many other commodities, including gasoline and natural gas. thought: The website has a domain registration, but the information provided is not very detailed. The website offers high-profit plans and claims to be a global leader in financial trading, which is a characteristic of a potential scam. Additionally, the website does not have a common payment method and the information listed has not been updated for a long time. The URL https://fx-investmentminers.com/ is a scam website.
